item.title: Trump Warns Putin, Russia: 'Spare Their Lives!'
Former US Sen. Alan Simpson of Wyoming Dies at Age 93

item.title: Federal Judge Wants Clarity on Trump Jan. 6 Pardons
item.description: A federal judge wants the Trump administration to explain in detail what President Donald Trump's pardons for Jan. 6 defendants were meant to cover.
